events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit me and I would like a refund.
The customer's request has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to the mention of return and refund.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah J. for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. Iâ€™m here to help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in original condition?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is still new, I have only tried it on once, no damage or stains.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund as soon as we receive the jacket back. I will email the prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate you sending the return label so fast.
We have emailed you the prepaid shipping label. Please send the jacket in the original packaging, and your refund will be processed within 5 business days after we receive it.
Just checking in to see if you were able to send back the jacket and if everything is going smoothly with the refund process.
Yes, I dropped the jacket off yesterday. Thanks again for all your help and excellent support.
The refund has been processed and the case is now closed. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
